Nightlight::

"Dont' worry Vapirtron, we could find the way to solve that problem" 
said Nightlight "must exist a way to solve it..."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Wheeljack-X::
> 
> The sound of hoverjets interrupts the conversation as Jackie 
reaches 
> the scene in vehicle mode.
> 
> "Gangway!" he calls in a voice that is a bit too cheerful for the 
> situation.  "Let the scientist have a look at this gizmo!"
> 
> He transforms to robot mode, retracting one of his hands and 
popping 
> out a small but very complex scanner apparatus in its place.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Lestat Lioncourt <thevmprlestat2000@y...> wrote:
> > 
> > Vampirtron:
> >      As Rodimus crushes the boulder Vampirtron leaps out of the 
> woods. A surge of energon takes him and he falls to his 
> knees. "AHHHH!!!!!!" He yells, "Beast mode!" He transforms to the 
> large black wolf that he is, but the energon still is running 
through 
> him, "Ahhh, it burns!" Finally, after about a minute of agony, it 
> stops.
> >      "I can't take pure energon," Vampirtron said to himself, "I 
> can't hold it at all. That must be why I have to feed on other 
> transformers. Rodimus, I don't know how long I can last without 
> feeding on other Transformers. I may become a danger to yourself 
and 
> your Maximals. I will try to hold it, but if I can't, you must lock 
> me away."
> >  RoboRick007 wrote:: : Rodimus Prime / Kup : : Rodimus recieved a 
> comm message. When he activated it a holographic image of Galvatron 
> appeared. It was perjected by the comm system in his wrist. After 
it 
> ended Rodimus looked inraged. Rodimus Prime: Ahhhhhhhh! I'll get 
> youuuuuuuuuuuu! Rodimus slams his fist intoa large boulder near by. 
> The boulder crumbles around the Autobot's fist. Rodimus Prime: He 
> thinks this is fun, Kup. When it comes down to just him and I, I'll 
> take him down for good. I didn't get it done before, but I'll make 
> sure of it now... Kup: Calm down, lad. I know how you feel. i've 
been 
> with you a long time Rody, I've seen all the crap he's done. You'll 
> get him, and I'll be the first to congradulate you. Rodimus Prime: 
> Thanks old friend.----- Original Message ----- From: 
aerosmith60@c... 
> To: nbwrpg@y... Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 7:40 PMSubject: 
> Rodimus, Quilldart, Galvatron
> > Galvatron saw  Quilldart jet towards the base. "Good no doubt the 
> other two are not far behind." He sent a comm to Rodimus. A 
> holographic image of himself would display. "I am so glad Rodimus 
we 
> could come to terms. As for our one on one battle. Dont you worry. 
> That will happen in due time. Until then best of luck my old 
friend. 
> I havent had this much fun since our little unicron 
> adventure...wouldnt you agree?" He ended the comm and turned back 
to 
> the map. He had his three blips on the screen.
